name: Golden Latte
preparation:
1. In a cup or mug, stir latte mix with hot water until dissolved.  
  2. Pour milk into a large, microwave-safe measuring cup. Microwave on high 1 min, or until milk starts to bubble. Using Air Wand or whisk, beat until frothy.  
  3. Pour frothed milk into cup containing latte mixture. Sprinkle with cinnamon, if desired.
tips: Try it iced! Stir 1 heaping tbsp of latte mix into 1⁄2 cup hot water to dissolve. Add 1⁄2 cup cold milk and pour over ice. Serve blended, if desired.
